function.description: Calculate the number of permutations of a multiset given the counts of each distinct item.
function.name: calculate_permutations_multiset

counts.description: A dictionary with counts of each distinct item.

total_items.description: The total number of items in the multiset.

function.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled over a certain number of days given specific rolling rules.
function.name: calculate_expected_rolls

days.description: The number of days over which to calculate expected rolls.

function.description: Count arrangements of objects with given conditions and categories.
function.name: count_arrangements_with_conditions

distinguished_counts.description: A dictionary containing counts of different elements for the arrangement.

function.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled given specific rules about rolling and outcomes.
function.name: calculate_expected_dice_rolls

year_days.description: The number of days in the year, typically 365 or 366 for leap years.

function.description: Calculate permutations of a multiset given counts of distinct items.
function.name: count_permutations_multiset

counts.description: A dictionary with counts of each distinct item.

total_items.description: The total number of items in the multiset.

function.description: Calculate the number of combinations of choosing k items from n items.
function.name: calculate_combinations

function.description: Calculate the number of permutations of n items taken k at a time.
function.name: calculate_permutations

function.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled given the specific rules about rolling.
function.name: expected_rolls_die

days.description: The number of days over which to calculate expected rolls.
